channel.title: Getting my server online WITHOUT router
channel.description:
Okay well...
I disconnected my router because I couldn't be bothered anymore with port forwarding, and changed to my normal modem.
I've got No-IP DUC running and I opened the ports on windows firewall... but still people can't get to my server.
Any ideas? HELPPPPPPP.[br]

item.title: Getting my server online WITHOUT router
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

If you do not have a router blocking you from the internet, then you do not have to do anything. It should be directly connected to the internet this way.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting my server online WITHOUT router

item.title: Getting my server online WITHOUT router
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

yes it is posible. Internet providers can put someone on a NAT based IP, if thats the case, then i dont think he can host via no-ip. i know becuase thats the case for me.

i know many people who can host via no-ip without a router, becuase their ISP doesnt set them on a NAT based IP. dont ask me to explain NAT its complicated.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting my server online WITHOUT router

item.description:
@s_t_r_0mega wrote:

Hm, maybe because you used to have a router before it requieres it now? Im not entirely sure. You think you could tell me how to get my server off of stupid hamachi without a router? I thought i could only do hamachi. Ill try and help you with your problem with the knowledge on the computer i do have… We can help eachother ^^
